value.title: This month in AWS Machine Learning: October edition
value.excerpt: Every day there is something new going on in the world of AWS Machine Learning—from launches to new to use cases to interactive trainings. We’re packaging some of the not-to-miss information from the ML Blog and beyond for easy perusing each month. Check back at the end of each month for the latest roundup.

value.title: Is Self-Help AI The New Trend?
value.excerpt: With the use of artificial intelligence in healthcare taking off this year, companies creating AI-enabled tools to understand the mental health of individuals and their behaviors in group settings.

value.title: NVIDIA Intros Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit for AI and Robotics Ed
value.excerpt: NVIDIA has introduced its new Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit, a new system designed for “learning, building and teaching AI and robotics.” The Linux-based system is built around a 128-core NVIDIA Maxwell GPU and a 1.43 GHz quad-core ARM A57 CPU.

value.title: Want To Infuse AI Into Your Apps With Minimal Effort? Try Microsoft Lobe

value.title: AI Technology Can Enhance Human-Centered Work Instead Of Threaten It
value.excerpt: Samasource, a training data and validation company, believes AI can enhance how we work. The company operates with care for its employees and communities, showing that advanced technology solutions do not have to be the enemy of a human-centered workforce.

value.title: AI Evolutions And Revolutions In 2021
value.excerpt: As I watch 2021 approach, I have both trepidation and hope. I have concern over the multitude of ways in which the world will change around me, but I also have hope for the promising opportunities in our future.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Platform Reduces Hospital Admissions By Over 50% In Trial
value.excerpt: An artificial intelligence-based diagnostic tool has reduced hospital admissions by 51% among elderly patients identified by the tool as being high-risk, according to results of a trial released by health care provider Clare Medical.

value.title: How AI is helping Indian cotton farmers reduce pesticide use

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Helps in Early Diagnosis of Alzheimer's

value.title: Google’s AI converts webpages into videos
